Package org.opengrok.indexer.search.context

Class PhraseHighlight

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.search.context.PhraseHighlight
public class PhraseHighlight extends Object
Represents a highlighted phrase within a line -- possibly with bounds indicating that the highlight begins or ends on another line.
